languages.text: "Быть может... Нам нужно просто уступить... Ты всегда говорила, душа моя, что Даргонус тебе не дом..." {n}Абеляр смотрит мимо вас на одному ему видную собеседницу. На дрожащих губах появляется неуверенная улыбка.{/n} "Ты хочешь этого, душа моя?... Оставить все это... позади... убраться подальше... отойти от дел..."

traits.locale_text: "Быть может... Нам нужно просто уступить... Ты всегда говорила, душа моя, что Даргонус тебе не дом..." {n}Абеляр смотрит мимо вас на одному ему видную собеседницу. На дрожащих губах появляется неуверенная улыбка.{/n} "Ты хочешь этого, душа моя?... Оставить все это... позади... убраться подальше... отойти от дел..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Perhaps... we should just give in... You always say that Dargonus is not your home, love..." {n}Abelard is looking past you at someone only he can see. There is a timid smile on his trembling lips.{/n} "Would you like that, love? Would you rather leave... leave it all behind... go somewhere far away... away from our toils?"
languages.original_text: "Быть может... Нам нужно просто уступить... Ты всегда говорила, душа моя, что Даргонус тебе не дом..." {n}Абеляр смотрит мимо вас на одному ему видную собеседницу. There is a timid smile on his trembling lips.{/n} "Would you like that, love? Would you rather leave... leave it all behind... go somewhere far away... away from our toils?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「もう…諦めた方がいい…あなたは常々ダルゴナスは故郷ではないと言っているではないか…」{n}アベラルドはあなたではなく、そこにはいない誰かを見つめている。彼の震える唇には臆病な笑みが浮かんでいる。{/n}「それがあなたの望みなのか、愛しい人よ？すべてを捨てて…どこか遠くへ…苦しみのないところへ…行きたいのか？」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... we should just give in... You always say that Dargonus is not your home, love..." {n}Abelard is looking past you at someone only he can see. There is a timid smile on his trembling lips.{/n} "Would you like that, love? Would you rather leave... leave it all behind... go somewhere far away... away from our toils?"

traits.locale_text: 「もう…諦めた方がいい…あなたは常々ダルゴナスは故郷ではないと言っているではないか…」{n}アベラルドはあなたではなく、そこにはいない誰かを見つめている。彼の震える唇には臆病な笑みが浮かんでいる。{/n}「それがあなたの望みなのか、愛しい人よ？すべてを捨てて…どこか遠くへ…苦しみのないところへ…行きたいのか？」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “或许……咱们不然就这么算了吧？……你总是说，达戈努斯没有家的感觉，亲爱的……”{n}阿贝拉德的视线越过了你，看着某个只有他自己才能看到的人。他的嘴唇颤抖着，露出羞涩的微笑。{/n}“你觉得怎么样，亲爱的？你想这么一走了之……把一切都抛在脑后……去个遥远的地方……卸下担子？”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... we should just give in... You always say that Dargonus is not your home, love..." {n}Abelard is looking past you at someone only he can see. There is a timid smile on his trembling lips.{/n} "Would you like that, love? Would you rather leave... leave it all behind... go somewhere far away... away from our toils?"

traits.locale_text: “或许……咱们不然就这么算了吧？……你总是说，达戈努斯没有家的感觉，亲爱的……”{n}阿贝拉德的视线越过了你，看着某个只有他自己才能看到的人。他的嘴唇颤抖着，露出羞涩的微笑。{/n}“你觉得怎么样，亲爱的？你想这么一走了之……把一切都抛在脑后……去个遥远的地方……卸下担子？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Tal vez deberíamos ceder... Siempre dices que Dargonus no es tu hogar, amor...». {n}Abelard mira a alguien que solo él puede ver. Hay una tímida sonrisa en sus temblorosos labios.{/n} «¿Te gustaría, amor? ¿Preferirías irte... dejarlo todo atrás... irte a algún lugar lejano... lejos de nuestros problemas?».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... we should just give in... You always say that Dargonus is not your home, love..." {n}Abelard is looking past you at someone only he can see. There is a timid smile on his trembling lips.{/n} "Would you like that, love? Would you rather leave... leave it all behind... go somewhere far away... away from our toils?"

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez deberíamos ceder... Siempre dices que Dargonus no es tu hogar, amor...». {n}Abelard mira a alguien que solo él puede ver. Hay una tímida sonrisa en sus temblorosos labios.{/n} «¿Te gustaría, amor? ¿Preferirías irte... dejarlo todo atrás... irte a algún lugar lejano... lejos de nuestros problemas?».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht ... sollten wir einfach nachgeben ... Ihr sagt immer, dass Dargonus nicht Euer Zuhause ist, mein Herz ..." {n}Abelard blickt an dir vorbei zu jemandem, den nur er sehen kann. Auf seinen zitternden Lippen liegt ein schüchternes Lächeln.{/n} "Würde Euch das gefallen, mein Herz? Möchtet Ihr lieber weggehen ... alles hinter Euch lassen ... irgendwo weit weg ... fern von unseren Mühen?"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... we should just give in... You always say that Dargonus is not your home, love..." {n}Abelard is looking past you at someone only he can see. There is a timid smile on his trembling lips.{/n} "Would you like that, love? Would you rather leave... leave it all behind... go somewhere far away... away from our toils?"

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht ... sollten wir einfach nachgeben ... Ihr sagt immer, dass Dargonus nicht Euer Zuhause ist, mein Herz ..." {n}Abelard blickt an dir vorbei zu jemandem, den nur er sehen kann. Auf seinen zitternden Lippen liegt ein schüchternes Lächeln.{/n} "Würde Euch das gefallen, mein Herz? Möchtet Ihr lieber weggehen ... alles hinter Euch lassen ... irgendwo weit weg ... fern von unseren Mühen?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Peut-être devrions-nous... abandonner... Tu as toujours dit que nous n'étions pas chez nous sur Dargonus, mon amour... » {n}Un sourire timide sur ses lèvres tremblantes, Abélard regarde par-dessus votre épaule vers quelqu'un qu'il semble être le seul à voir.{/n} « Serais-tu heureuse, mon amour ? Si nous quittions cet endroit... sans nous retourner... pour aller loin... loin de ces tourments... ? »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... we should just give in... You always say that Dargonus is not your home, love..." {n}Abelard is looking past you at someone only he can see. There is a timid smile on his trembling lips.{/n} "Would you like that, love? Would you rather leave... leave it all behind... go somewhere far away... away from our toils?"

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être devrions-nous... abandonner... Tu as toujours dit que nous n'étions pas chez nous sur Dargonus, mon amour... » {n}Un sourire timide sur ses lèvres tremblantes, Abélard regarde par-dessus votre épaule vers quelqu'un qu'il semble être le seul à voir.{/n} « Serais-tu heureuse, mon amour ? Si nous quittions cet endroit... sans nous retourner... pour aller loin... loin de ces tourments... ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Acaba diyorum... Pes mi etsek?.. Dargonus'ta mutlu olmadığını söyleyip duruyorsun aşkım..." {n}Abelard sana değil, arkanda olan ve sadece kendisinin görebildiği birisine bakıyor. Titreyen dudaklarında çekingen bir gülümseme var.{/n} "Bunu ister misin canım? Her şeyi bırakalım... Başka bir yerlere gidelim... Tüm dertlerimizi ardımızda bırakalım mı?"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... we should just give in... You always say that Dargonus is not your home, love..." {n}Abelard is looking past you at someone only he can see. There is a timid smile on his trembling lips.{/n} "Would you like that, love? Would you rather leave... leave it all behind... go somewhere far away... away from our toils?"

traits.locale_text: "Acaba diyorum... Pes mi etsek... Dargonus'ta mutlu olmadığını söyleyip duruyorsun aşkım..." {n}Abelard; sana değil, arkanda sadece kendisinin görebildiği birisine bakıyor. Titreyen dudaklarında çekingen bir gülümseme var.{/n} "Bunu ister misin canım? Bırakalım mı her şeyi? Gidelim mi başka bir yerlere? Tüm dertlerimizi ardımızda bırakalım mı?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
